full_output.summary: Computer Science student at SRM University AP with proficiency in Python, C, C++, Java, and front-end development. Passionate about software engineering and eager to learn new technologies. Demonstrated ability to apply technical skills to solve real-world problems and contribute to positive social change. Seeking opportunities to expand my skill set and contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic environment.

education.school: Board of Intermediate Education Andhra Pradesh
Board of Secondary Education Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Typing game(Fingers First)
projects.description: Developed a typing game to enhance typing skills in a competitive manner. Improve accuracy and speed of typing skills.

projects.name: Student Admission Management
projects.description: Developed a portal to manage student admissions based on EAMCET rank. Includes separate logins for students and colleges to manage admissions and verification.

projects.name: Bakery Management System(Doughlicious Dashboard)
projects.description: Developed a GUI program for a bakery management system to enable users to select and place orders online. Purpose: Provide a user-friendly interface for customers to order food online and manage delivery and payment.

projects.name: Mystery-Match (Dating App)
projects.description: Developed a dating app to provide users with traditional and authentic dating experiences through carefully matched in-person encounters. Purpose: Facilitate genuine connections by orchestrating blind dates, emphasizing shared interests, values, and preferences.

projects.name: Patient Database Management Using Blockchain
projects.description: Developed a system to enhance security and efficiency in medical record-keeping and processing medical bills and insurance claims. Purpose: Address vulnerabilities in traditional medical record-keeping using blockchain technology.

experiences.description: Conducted in-depth research on biometric authentication systems, focusing on EEG (Electroencephalogram) authentication as a novel approach. Investigated various biometric recognition systems such as fingerprint, voice, iris, and face recognition, identifying their strengths and limitations. Analyzed the efficacy of different classifier models (K-Nearest Neighbors, Auto Encoders, Support Vector Machines, XGBoost, and Convolutional Neural Networks) in biometric data classification, feature learning, and pattern recognition. Contributed to the understanding of EEGs significance in liveness detection and its potential applications in secure biometric systems.

full_output.name: Bhoomika Kotharu
